definition[0]: used to show that you think something must be true, especially when people seem to be disagreeing with you
example[0]: You must have heard about the riots, surely?
example[1]: There must surely be some explanation.
example[2]: Surely we can’t just stand back and let this happen?
example[3]: Such sinners will surely be punished.
definition[2]: used to say ‘yes’ to someone or to express agreement with them
